website_summaries.verdict: A set of beach toys that comes with a mesh bag that makes them easy to carry and shake clean.
pros: Comes with several tools and shapes as well as two shovels and three rakes
Small mesh bag is a lightweight backpack style that smaller kids can help carry
cons: Bucket is only six inches tall
Toys are made for very young children

website_summaries.verdict: A bag full of toys that just happen to trick kids into learning as well.
pros: With tools of all shapes and sizes, this toy set is ideal for  kids of all ages and for those learning to share as well
Parents love the backpack, which makes cleanup a breeze
We love that the products are BPA-free
cons: Sizes are not consistent and may not appeal to specific ages

customer_reviews.title: Small items in a small carry bag
customer_reviews.text: It's decent for the price, but tiny. The "large" shovel is very small.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and super variety of toys!
customer_reviews.text: This is a FANTASTIC sand toy set....all in a neat, light weight netting with straps that my 18mo old grandson can put on his back like a backpack and be a BIG BOY! There are long shovels and rakes and short little shovels and rakes. There are turtle and starfish molds that work so well in the sand. And the sand sifter does a great job too. There’s also a water can and two sizes of buckets. It’s hard to believe how much fits in this cute little bag...and so easy to stuff all of it back in the bag when done. Clean-up is a breeze. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rotramel

customer_reviews.title: Bag breaks immediately
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old son absolutely LOVED this set. The bag was the best part cause he could wear it on our walk to the beach. The toys themselves are great and still are. But the straps on the bag broke immediately (on our 5 minute walk) the very first day of our beach trip. He was SO DISAPPOINTED. If the bag had remained intact I would have given this product 5 stars. The manufacturer should reinforce the straps!!!
customer_reviews.author: lovinMDR

customer_reviews.title: Not a sturdy plastic! But can't expect more for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a sturdy plastic ! But can't expect more for the price I guess !
customer_reviews.author: Dhiraj Peechara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap toys, but your kid will not care. We got these for a last minute beach trip and my 5 year old loved playing with these. They are all still in tact, so we were able to use them for our sandbox at home. The straps on the bag came in handy too. Our son enjoyed carrying his own toys on his back.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok quality. The color fades in the sun after several days.
customer_reviews.author: CityPig

customer_reviews.title: Comes in carrying tote
customer_reviews.text: I got these for our 2 year old granddaughter to play with at the beach on our boat. Came in a great mesh tote, she felt important carrying this to the boat, and helped divert a tantrum by giving her a job! Nice variety. Kept her busy. They float too. Easy to clean up and stow in the the boat too.
customer_reviews.author: stmi

customer_reviews.title: Cute little set
customer_reviews.text: This set comes with a lot of pieces, but they are all super small. The water wheel is great. But all the digging tools are tiny. One of them we literally used as a spoon becauae we forgot to bring one down to the beach. The net carrying bag is nice and easy for shaking sand off. Would probably not buy again. Would have bought one that was the same price and exact same stuff but bigger buckets/shovels/etc at costco if I had seen it
customer_reviews.author: Anne T.

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.  There are better sets.
customer_reviews.text: Not to sound like Goldilocks here, but the shovels are either teeny tiny or awkwardly big. Would be nice if there was a normal size shovel in this kit. Also, some of the pieces have plastic sharp pieces hanging off of them that cut my son's hand. Overall I'm not too happy with this , there are much better sets out there.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set, high quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift but I inspected it prior to giving it away. The items appear to be very sturdy and of a high quality plastic. I liked it so much that I plan on buying the same set for my son! There is a nice diversity to the toys and it comes with a thin, mesh bag. Not really sure how much stress the bag can handle, it might not make it more than a few trips to the park/beach.
customer_reviews.author: SimplySky

customer_reviews.title: Great price and with a carrying bag - hours of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: The toys are sturdy and numerous so it entertained my 5 year old and 7 year old at the beach for several hours. We all loved that it had its own carrying case so they could carry their own toys out to the beach and use it to collect shells as well. It thoughtfully includes more than one shovel and bucket so that makes play for multiple kids much more enjoyable. Great price too - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: many pieces made of good heavy duty plastic, grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: many pieces made of good heavy duty plastic in a mesh bag with a draw string; bucket, watering can, little rake, little scoop, little shovel, little sieve, big shovel, big rake, sieve for the bucket, 10 forms to make figures in the sand (two turtles, two octopus, sea horse, star fish, duck, clam shell, boat, and castle wall). Grand kids (ages 6 and 3) love it. I recommend every grandpa get one.
customer_reviews.author: John Johnston

customer_reviews.title: my kids all loved playing with these sand toys at the beach
customer_reviews.text: so many choices to pick from. my kids all loved playing with these sand toys at the beach. they are made of a nice strong plastic. The carrying bag they come in is a little small when trying to fit them all back in the bag. The straps also come loose, but the bag isn't the 'fun' part of the toys, so I just recommend using another bag of some sort if you prefer. For the price, this is a nice item for kids and parents.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great sand toy set!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought these sand toys for my kids. I wanted to go ahead and purchase toys before we got to the beach so we wouldn't have to spend a lot at souvenir shops and this was the perfect set! Love the bag they come in also. It was so easy for my 8 yr old and 4 yr old to carry on the beach
customer_reviews.author: ak2012

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle
customer_reviews.text: Opened these up to play with today and the handle of the long rake is missing a chunk and cracked all the way through. Rest of the toys are fine. Slightly disappointed to receive a broken product. Overall appreciate the bag that comes with all the toys. Lots of variety in toys. Can be used as water toys and sand toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sand Toys
customer_reviews.text: Great sand toys! We purchased these to replaced a set of sand toys we left behind on a recent beach trip. Our little guy loves his sands toys so we knew we had to buy something before he noticed. I found these and they were perfect! Not only did they replace his left behind toys they work great for his little sand box at the house. He uses all of the items to rake, scoop, pack and build in his sand. These are a must have for your beach trips or your back yard trips to the sand box!
customer_reviews.author: Audiobahnguy

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love the bag, easy to carry (as a bagpack)
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for our trip in Florida during Christmas holiday. Bought it for my 3 years old boy. He enjoyed it. Another great thing about it is the bag. We carry the bag back and forth to the beach. And when returning from the beach, I just had to rinse everything out from the bag. No need to take everything out of the bag/ rinse the whole bag with everything inside. Leave it on the balcony or outside and it dries/ that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA N'DEDE

customer_reviews.title: It's So Small!
customer_reviews.text: I just didn't expect it to be so tiny! I should have paid closer attention. These are really small toys. I don't even think you could call the pail a bucket. It's more like a measuring cup! Hahaha! I'll have to search some more for something so my grandies won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Momovich

customer_reviews.title: If ordering more than one, there will be different items in each
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my 3 and 4 year kids and they came with different things in them. Anyone who has kids knows that is a problem lol. I just threw away the items there was only one of between the two backpacks before they could see it. WW III has been averted for another day.
customer_reviews.author: mega

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Underwhelming, overpriced. The bag is cute but everything is cheap. Kind of just expected more for $14 but now it’s beach day and I don’t have time to exchange it .
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small toys
customer_reviews.text: Very very tiny toy. Would definitely not buy again. Over price dollar tree would have better sand toys. There is a lot of better options with better prices. Sadly I keep because we were going to the beach the next day, if not I would probably return.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, the bucket has a leak!
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect good quality, I think it is poor quality for the price that wasn't cheap for plastic items. The worse was the bucket for water, it has a leak, a hole in the bottom as you can see in the photos. Poor quality of the product and poor quality control of manufacturer, distribution and retail.
customer_reviews.author: Rainer

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag and set
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute toy set and my 21 month old daughter loves carrying around the bag. It’s small enough for a toddler to carry their toys and feel like a big kid. Toys are a nice mix. Are a tad cheaper in quality but are still good & priced accordingly. Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke before first use
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about the strap breaking but I thought maybe the kids were rough with it. Nope, I carried it to the car for the first use & it broke as soon as I picked it up. The toys are nice but the bucket is small. I would think that when my daughter gets older it won't be good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good - not great
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are on the small side. Some are a good size, but the quality doesn't match up with the price. The sets in the stores are similar and cost less. A few pieces bent on the first day of use, but have not yet broken in half.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Toys!
customer_reviews.text: Our last set of sand toys became cracked and unusable after just one season. Looking around for a smaller set with a bag to use. So far so good! Seems to hold up well and cleans off easily. Not too much sand tries to hold on.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda2018

customer_reviews.title: Looks like fun
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the product yet as it was purchased for my Niece's 1st birthday. I can tell you this is very cute, and looks like it will be a lot of fun to play with at the beach. I love that the carry bag is a little back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Broyles

customer_reviews.title: Good for babies and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These are not the best set I have ever bought but okay for a baby to toddler stage. Older kids need larger shelves and buckets. This set is package well, easy to carry but won’t be fun for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D  Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This a great product. Lots of different toys. The bag is very helpful for carrying and shaking all the dirt/sand off. These held up surprisingly well to dirt. Definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a beach trip over the summer and my kids loved this. The only thing is that the toys were smaller than they appeared in the pictures but that's my fault for not reading the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Hannnah

customer_reviews.title: Great sandbox bag
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different toys in this sandbox bag. Especially liked that it had large and small shovels for my two year old. Molds and all other items are very solid and do not appear to break easily. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son instantly loved these sand toys to my surprise. And played with them while we camped over the weekend. It was a great purchase!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Mesh bag is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was super excited to get these for her sandbox and also good for her sprinkler. Gave 4 stars for durability because I mean, they’re plastic, but very excited to use them! The mesh bag backpack is the best part.
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: Fun, organized set
customer_reviews.text: A great little set of beach/sand toys. There are molds, an assortment of shovels, rakes and scoops, and a nice bucket... all in a mesh bag perfect for transporting without bringing more dirt and sand home. I wish the bucket was a little bit larger, but it is just right for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Mehhhhhh not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I love that it comes in the mesh bag. It makes it really easy to throw everything in it then just wash it out in the water. The plastic is really cheap, bends easily and there isn’t a square sandcastle :-(
customer_reviews.author: Butterboo

customer_reviews.title: great for the beach or starting a band
customer_reviews.text: My little girl decided to first start a band by having all the different toys be instruments for the whole family. The product is extremely durable at a great price. The bag makes it easy to store and carry. Can't wait to bring this with us to the river.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Bug

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect set! Quite honestly all my daughter wanted from this was the water can but i wanted To get a set. The back pack is great because she carries it to the beach herself.
customer_reviews.author: Jess cislo

customer_reviews.title: It was bigger than expected at a great price. My 22 month old especially likes all ...
customer_reviews.text: Really pleasantly surprised with this item. It was bigger than expected at a great price. My 22 month old especially likes all the shoveling options and the big bucket. I can foresee many years of play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun beach as well as bath toy
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a bath toy for my 9mo but keep on seeing issues with mold due to holes that are punched into toys. Bought this beach toy set instead and was able to use some of them as bath toy and my LO loves it. He is holding tight to some of them and won't even let go. Love the product and I don't have to worry about molding issue anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci Lau

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: these were disappointing to me - I guess I thought they would be bigger - didn't expect LARGE - but these were very very small - the bucket is like " 2 cups" and the rake/shovel is like 6" - comes in cute little bag - maybe would be good for toddlers/ very young kids - didn't work for me 5-8 yr. grand kids
customer_reviews.author: Pamela  S Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that for the price, these would be flimsy, but they are a very nice set. Lots of pieces, and I love the mesh bag. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess P.

customer_reviews.title: Ended up Returning
customer_reviews.text: i bought a used sandbox and the seller gave us all of her kid's old sand toys so I didn't end up needing these, but the set was pretty nice. The plastic wasn't' super thick so I don't know how long this stuff would have lasted with my son.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Eastridge

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This was not a good quality toy and likely would not hold up with a toddler. Would be nice to know the poor quality before purchase so it didn’t cost half the price of the product to return it
customer_reviews.author: Emmalee Colby

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal. Fun Toys.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler was thrilled with this sand toy set and we haven't even been to the beach yet. The backpack straps on the mesh carrying bag are a nice touch. -1 star because the quality of the material is not that great, but you can't go wrong for $13.50.
customer_reviews.author: mir23

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome set for kids to play with! The toys are very durable and so many come in the set. Love the bag to because the toys can dry easily after being rinsed off. :)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: A lot of stuff in the bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge collection of beach toys. That is great because kids use these things a lot and lose a piece or break it. This particular set, the sand mill is kind of cool. The kids liked it, but they wanted to put wet sand in it. I suggested water instead and life was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great first beach set for young children!
customer_reviews.text: Great beach set for toddlers. Perfect size and love the little back pack that the toys come in. A great way for a child to carry their own toys and teach them to be responsible for carrying their own things to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Cool sand toys
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Our toddler uses the beach tools daily. They have help up well. Fairly easily to clean. I like that it came with a bag, everything fits nicely
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best summer beach gift I ever gave!
customer_reviews.text: First of all it was perfect for a day at the beach- all of the items come in an easy to carry net bag. There were so many cute sand toys. I gave this as a gift and I was so pleased with the quality. Def would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Storage
customer_reviews.text: My boys (ages 3 and 5) loved these toys on our recent beach trip! All the tools were very good quality!My three year old was able to carry the bag like a backpack. My favorite part was that it did not take an act of God to fit all the toys back in the bag!! Most packaging requires a tetris expert to get things back into the packaging, but these toys all went back into the bag easily after we used them over the course of several days!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Small pieces, not ideal.
customer_reviews.text: The tools are really small and some of the tools are the exact same, just different plastic color. Really wish it at least had one big bucket or one big shovel.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the mesh bag
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty good quality. Sturdy for use at the beach and love that it comes with a mesh bag to easily shake out the sand at the end of the beach day
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean with this bag. I just dip it in the ocean a couple times and we’re on our way! My three year old loves them!
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then expected but still great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toys for a toddler at the beach! Bought for a trip to fire Island this week and it arrived in time as promised!
customer_reviews.author: meg vin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set of beach toys!
customer_reviews.text: My adorable daughter (trust me she is!) loved these beach toys! Kept her and a new friend occupied for a while! There were so many molds they built a castle! The bag they come in is amazing just stuff the toys in and shake it to get all the sand out! Great quality product for a steal of a price!!
customer_reviews.author: Mpat

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag they came in to store them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in my rv for the kids they loved playing with them. I love the bag they came in because it makes it easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made toys
customer_reviews.text: The backpack arrived with the straps held together by threads, we couldn't even wear the pack without the straps breaking. The toys are pretty cheap and the set is very small. The pictures make the set look much bigger than it really is. Overall, not very Impressed with the set for the money paid. This set to me seems like it could cost about $5-$10, not $22 with shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for kids at beach
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our toddler for our beach trip this summer. It was perfect. The carrying bag was super convenient and we honestly used it to clean everything off. We would put all the toys in the mesh bag before we left and went and put the whole thing in the ocean to rinse everything off. The molds surprisingly worked pretty well too! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great sand toy set for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further, this set has it all; bucket, shovel, water wheels, sand shapers, the works! The toys are all perfectly sized for toddlers and kept my 1.5 year old occupied for ages at the beach. She even liked wearing the backpack herself and helped us carry everything to and from the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Allana D

customer_reviews.title: Great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson left his old set at the beach. This new one is even better. The size is easier for him to use and he loves all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sharrell Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for the kids! I bought this and packed it for our trip tp Cancun and never had an issue. No breaking or cracks. A 11 year old and 2 year old played with this set and neither had any issues. The bag that it came in was great for the kids to exert independence. The toys had a great variety to them. I wish there would have been maybe one more bucket or something similar to hold/transport sand since there were a lot of digging utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. I want to buy one for my friend’s daughter too
customer_reviews.author: Yu Ma

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Many different pieces
customer_reviews.text: We havnt used it on the sand since it's been cold/raining but my son has been playing with it and so far nothing's broken yet despite the toys being thrown to the floor. This has many pieces that are not just molds. Also love that it includes a bag. So far no rips on our bag. Also great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ged

customer_reviews.title: Easy beach bag
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful with our beach vacation only thing is the backpack straps fall our occasionally which made it difficult while already lugging to many items back to the hotel (Kids..). However, the quality of the toys was great and my daughter had a wonderful time playing with them!
customer_reviews.author: Chantry Oxner

customer_reviews.title: Good value! Kids love this ask now
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my 6 year old niece when she came to visit me in Florida. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Infiesto

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was happy with this toy set when we hit the beach. Came in perfect shape but one of the straps was tearing but I just cut the string and put some fire to it and it was all good after that.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.!
customer_reviews.text: Little one is happy with it. This set found itsstorage place in newly built.6'x6' sand box outside. Tho sandbox is have seal cover, but toys held up pretty good so far. Made nicely as well. Nothing broken and working. Good quality ! Ty
customer_reviews.author: Big Griz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old loves these and was so excited that all of it fit in the provided backpack that he can wear to the beach! Even had room to add more without making the bag too big for him to carry! Buckets are smaller, so I would recommend for toddler aged children.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for...
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself was torn. The red mesh and one of the straps. One was cracked. Cute though
customer_reviews.author: JM_661

customer_reviews.title: Beachy
customer_reviews.text: The shovels are smaller than expected rather hard to play with at the beach. More work than you’d bargain for ;)
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiny tot
customer_reviews.text: A lot for my toddler to explore and play with- love the bag that comes with it to hold it all.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Cute, quality beach toys. My 1 year old twins love them!
customer_reviews.text: My year old twins loved to play with these at the beach. And at home they also enjoy them. They always carry around the little buckets! Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best toy assortment ever and works well for both water ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toy assortment ever and works well for both water and sand. So nice to have a little backpack for a toddler to haul the toys, and the bucket can be used for berry picking as well
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1.5 yr old godson to take to the beach and seems to have enjoyed it. I'm hoping that he will get more use out of it this year. Hoping that I can find something else to get him for this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Great balue
customer_reviews.text: Great toy with net back pack for carrying, my grandson loved it
customer_reviews.author: Debra J. Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price, a bit smaller than I expected but was fine for my toddler to use
customer_reviews.author: P. Signor

customer_reviews.title: Smile on Child's Face
customer_reviews.text: The child I presented this to had a big smile on his face. He absolutely loved it. Looking forward to the beach and play time.
customer_reviews.author: nina coppola

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I received the product right away. I bought it for my grandson's 2nd birthday and he loves playing with it in his new sandbox. The price was great for the amount of toys that was in it. I had compared with other similar products and this was by far the best deal. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Palmer

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I expected and was cheap enough that we just left them at the hotel for the next family to enjoy. Pay it forward
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids to take on a recent vacation. It is exactly what I expected and was cheap enough that we just left them at the hotel for the next family to enjoy. Pay it forward.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set for the price. Very very happy with it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Beemee

customer_reviews.title: Has backpack straps!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 2.5 yr old at the beach and he loved it. So easy to throw everything into the mesh bag at the end of a long day, and I didn’t realize it has backpack-type straps! Kiddo insisted on carrying it himself the whole time (which was fine with me).
customer_reviews.author: Baylor Bear

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Cute set. Better than the Target set I bought. My kids had a lot of fun at the beach with them.
customer_reviews.author: Oana

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this this summer at the beach. The bag is great too! Just put all the toys in the bag, rinse it off and you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gwinn

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 19month old and it's perfect! The bag can be used as backpack so you don't have to worry about packing another bag for all the sand toys. For this price, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine - Hook Me Up Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sand toys! I didn't want to spend a lot on toys that will be outside a lot and probably taken by other children at the park over time, and these fit the bill. Lots of options and different pieces make the set fantastic for sharing.
customer_reviews.author: Bigredgirl

customer_reviews.title: great value, great toys!
customer_reviews.text: this comes with lots of toys! It's a great value and my son loves these. It has gardening type tools, too. A couple of the toys are in the bath, some are in the sandbox, and some are in the house. You really can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: Designing Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son played all summer long with them at the beach
customer_reviews.author: Kaltrine

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love that it comes in a backpack so it’s easy to carry! My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Borino

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My one year old daughter found these toys engaging, and they kept her busy on the beach. I especially appreciated the bag they came with that allows for easy carrying and drying. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loved carrying this on his back. It is lightweight and he felt like a big boy carrying it. The plastic sand toys aren't cheap looking or feeling either. I was really impressed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Fatimah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for your kiddos to have all they need to play in the sand!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of toys.
customer_reviews.text: Great pack! Lots of different fun sand toys. The shovels broke quickly though but that didn't phase my guys as there were so many other things to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Risner

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sturdy set with travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this set comes with it's own storage bag! It also had plenty of "tools" (shovel & rakes) for my 3 kids to share without fighting! They LOVED the watering can and the sifter to sift out small shells at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice collection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for children who might stay in my vacation rental home. The colors are wonderful and the variety is great. They look very durable so will not have to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: HOURS OF FUN IN THE SAND
customer_reviews.text: These sand toys are great, provide hours of fun in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Your kid needs these
customer_reviews.text: Ok I never write reviews but I had to for these toys. I bought them for my 9 month old and he loves them. There are so many different kinds of toys and they don’t feel cheap at all. The bag is nice too with a drawstring and it’s easy to rinse the whole bag in less than a minute. Definitely buy for beach days!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: great sandbox toys
customer_reviews.text: my kids love these! they were excited to play with them in their sand box.
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Great for toddler sandbox. Like the size of all the different sand toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: my grandkids loved it, we got it out and attracted lots of kids - worked well. Not sure about durability since we only used it that one weekend for now, but seems sturdy and durable. was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: abbey80

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it! Paired this with another 13 piece sand toy set and I think we had most of the bases covered. It was another for 4 kids to be entertained for quite a while. Arrived quick and has good quality.
customer_reviews.author: jsandvold

product_meta.title: Click N Play 18Piece Beach Sand Toy Set, Bucket, Shovels, Rakes, Watering Can, Molds
product_meta.description: This huge 18 piece fun beach toy set will keep your children busy for hours at the beach. It is made of high-quality BPA plastic that is perfect for your kid to play in the sand, in the pool, in the garden or wherever The kids would like to enjoy playing with them. The whole set includes 18 pc of different fun sand toys bucket, sifters molds etc.. So they can build sand castles or snow castles and use their creativity to build all sorts of other constructions. Make fun and creative shapes and sculptures. Also helps promote child's cognitive and imaginative skills.
feature_bullets: Fun and colorful 18 piece beach sand toy set for a creative day at the beach, made of BPA free material.
Make fun and creative shapes and sculptures, helps promote child's cognitive and imaginative skills
Set includes: bucket, 2 shovels, 3 rakes, 2 sand sifters, watering can.
Many sand mold; sea horse, turtle, Octopus, sea shell, Duck, starfish, boat, castle.
Approximate box Dimensions in inches; 12.5" X 7" X 10.5".
